topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53912d516368724b01ee0400#post_53912d516368724b01ee0400
We might need something a little heavier just in case, or you know, if we think it would be funny. I'll bring the stinger missile launcher, the Barret 50. cal and ohhhh... lets bring the mingun. You know, in case we want to hunt some ducks as well.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53912e076368724be8e80500#post_53912e076368724be8e80500
We're hunting a Plesioth, a 20-30 meter-long aquatic wyvern.
